Agent Economy

Articles Companies About RSS

AI 行业领先公司

探索塑造智能体经济的核心企业，从基础设施提供商到应用开发者。

Leading AI Companies

Explore the core enterprises shaping the agent economy, from infrastructure providers to application developers.

NVIDIA

基础设施 Infrastructure

全球 AI 计算和 GPU 技术的领导者，为全球大多数 AI 训练和推理工作负载提供算力支持。 World leader in AI computing and GPU technology, powering the majority of AI training and inference workloads globally.

OpenAI

模型提供商 Model Provider

ChatGPT 和 GPT 模型的创造者，引领大语言模型和对话式 AI 的发展。 Creator of ChatGPT and GPT models, leading the development of large language models and conversational AI.

Anthropic

模型提供商 Model Provider

Claude 背后的 AI 安全公司，专注于构建可靠、可解释和可控的 AI 系统。 AI safety company behind Claude, focused on building reliable, interpretable, and steerable AI systems.

Google / Alphabet

模型提供商 Model Provider

Gemini 模型的开发者和 AI 研究的先驱，深度整合于 Google 的产品和服务中。 Developer of Gemini models and pioneering AI research, with deep integration across Google products and services.

Meta

模型提供商 Model Provider

Llama 开源模型系列和 Meta AI 的创造者，推进开放式 AI 研究和开发。 Creator of the Llama open-source model family and Meta AI, advancing open AI research and development.

DeepSeek

模型提供商 Model Provider

中国 AI 公司，开发高效的大语言模型，以更低的训练成本实现具有竞争力的性能。 Chinese AI company developing efficient large language models with competitive performance at lower training costs.

Kimi (Moonshot AI)

模型提供商 Model Provider

Kimi K2.5 背后的中国 AI 公司，提供长上下文理解和智能体能力。 Chinese AI company behind Kimi K2.5, offering long-context understanding and agentic capabilities.

MiniMax

模型提供商 Model Provider

中国 AI 公司，构建全栈基础模型，包括文本、语音和视频生成。 Chinese AI company building full-stack foundation models including text, voice, and video generation.

Cursor

应用 Application

基于 VS Code 的 AI 驱动代码编辑器，提供智能代码补全、重构和自然语言编程。 AI-powered code editor built on VS Code, offering intelligent code completion, refactoring, and natural language programming.

Granola

应用 Application

AI 笔记本应用，可转录会议内容并通过自动摘要和行动项增强你的笔记。 AI notepad that transcribes meetings and enhances your notes with automatic summaries and action items.

Perplexity

搜索 Search

AI 驱动的答案引擎，通过实时搜索为复杂查询提供准确、带引用的回答。 AI-powered answer engine that provides accurate, cited responses to complex queries using real-time search.

Genspark

搜索 Search

AI 搜索和智能体平台，通过多步推理自主完成复杂任务。 AI search and agent platform that autonomously completes complex tasks with multi-step reasoning.

Midjourney

创意工具 Creative Tool

领先的 AI 图像生成平台，根据自然语言描述创造惊艳的视觉效果。 Leading AI image generation platform that creates stunning visuals from natural language descriptions.

Manus

应用 Application

通用 AI 智能体平台，可自主执行跨网页浏览、文档创建和数据分析的复杂任务。 General AI agent platform that autonomously executes complex tasks across web browsing, document creation, and data analysis.
